value:
h1. Bug Fixes
* BF1
* BF2

h1. Changes
New gRPC/REST service available: “Get last connected client”

h1. Improvements
* STOMP error frame body now contains JSON-encoded RPCStatus. 
* Impr1
* Impr2

h1. Breaking Changes
* STOMP error frame body (JSON) has changed:
** Old:
*** {{error}} - string
*** {{message}} - string
** New:
*** {{code}} -  integer (a [grpc code|https://grpc.github.io/grpc/core/md_doc_statuscodes.html])
*** {{message}} - string with additional details about the error (beyond what what the STOMP {{message}} header contains)

h1. Features
* Feat1
* Feat2
